channel.title: Music – Paul Young

item.title: Paul Young - Every Time You Go Away
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Daryl Hall
KY: 2471 / KY: 7478

Hey if we can’t
solve any problems
then why do
we lose so many tears?
oh so you go again
when the leading
man appears
Always the same theme
can’t you see
we’ve got everything
going on and on and on
Every time you go away
you take a piece of me
with you
Every time you go away
you take a piece of me
with you-

on and go free
maybe you’re too
close to see
I can feel
your body move
go again doesn’t mean
that much to me
I can’t go on singing
the same theme
Because can’t you see
we’ve got
everything baby
even though you know
Every time you go away
you take a piece of me
with you
Every time you go away
you take a piece of me
with you-

I can’t go on singing
the same theme
because baby can’t
you see we got
everything going
on and on and on
Every time you go away
you take a piece of me
with you
Every time you go away
you take a piece of me
with you-
